the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers.`` We're excited about( Keon Clark ),'' Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Antonio Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. Corporation is transforming audiences and dazzling critics with its insightful and compelling analysis. Taking its status as a legal`` person'' to the logical conclusion, the film puts the corporation on the psychiatrist's couch to ask What kind of person is it? The Corporation includes interviews with 40 corporate insiders and critics- including Noam Chomsky , Naomi Klein , Milton Friedman , Howard Zinn , Vandana Shiva and Michael Vick Moore- plus true confessions, case studies and strategies for change. Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign. `` For a Democratic Bill Clinton to win, you have to move to the center,'' said Mike Pence Martin, a Democratic operative from Missouri.`` This country is not ready for a pure progressive.
